name: YEN BIEN LUXURY HOTEL
address: Nguyễn Trãi Số 517 Nguyễn Trãi, Hà Giang, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Hà Giang, YEN BIEN LUXURY HOTEL cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 4 sao có hồ bơi ngoài trời theo mùa, nhà hàng và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ có chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và có cả dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

Tại khách sạn, tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình cáp, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi sen, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. YEN BIEN LUXURY HOTEL cung cấp một số căn nhìn ra thành phố và tất cả các phòng đều có ấm đun nước. Tất cả các căn có bàn làm việc.

Thành thạo tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt, đội ngũ nhân viên tại lễ tân luôn sẵn lòng đưa ra thông tin hữu ích về khu vực xung quanh.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách chỗ nghỉ 146 km.

review.comment_positive: Không gian tương đối yên tĩnh, giường ngủ thoải mái. Nói chung là một trải nghiệm khá.
Wins the distinction of the cleanest hotel i stayed in in vietnam. Room was excellent, so much so I stayed another night.
review.comment_negative: It was only after I had eaten on my second (final) night I realised the restaurant was open in the evenings. I was confused because all information provided in the hotel said the restaurant was on the ground floor, but it turned out it was on the 1st floor. Better info needed

review.rating: A real luxury hotel in Ha Giang
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is better than I expected. Room is clean and spacious. Staff are very attentive even sometimes with limited English, they still try to do their best to assist you . 
I did a massage in the hotel , the girl did massage for me did a really good job . I forgot her name . I highly recommend if you have time , try the massage in the hotel , very professional.
review.comment_negative: Not really, just the way they set the table for breakfast is a big strange.  Big round table for ten people. Probably for group. You can alway find small table . Breakfast variety is very limited.

review.comment_positive: tuyet qua di thoi
The room was very big compared to other hotels around the area. Closed to a lot of restaurants once you pass the bridge.

review.comment_negative: If you are in doubt about booking a hotel in Ha Giang, ABSOLUTELY do not book this hotel. This is by far the worst hotel I've ever been to (and I've been to many!). We had two separate nights as a base for the start and end of the Ha Giang Loop, but barely got any sleep. Both rooms had a horrible smoke smell that you can smell all over the hotel. This ensures that you cannot sleep.  In addition, loud Vietnamese music starts every morning at 05:15, played across the street from the hotel (a nice outside dance class), which will wake you up for sure! Yet another point;  we thought to do a quick little laundry (a small plastic bag) this turned out to be more expensive than the whole overnight stay (more than 40 USD!). Also they charged us for using the towels. Overall, I would recommend you really to don't book this hotel, there are much better options out there! In addition we pointed out al this point to the staff but they did not help us at all!

review.rating: Comfortable place to stay in ha giang
review.comment_positive: Large room, firm but comfortable bed with very soft & comfortable bedding & pillows. Wouldn’t describe as ‘luxury’ but certainly a comfortable place to stay in Ha Giang.
review.comment_negative: The food was average, we only had breakfast but it was one of the least memorable in our 2 weeks in Vietnam. Also they need to clean the limescale in the shower head - we stayed in 2 different rooms on 2 separate occasions but both showers were half-blocked with limescale & sending water in all directions. Not really a big problem just hopefully a nudge for the cleaning team to do this once in a while.

review.comment_positive: Very comfortable and clean bed, central location in Ha Giang, outstanding view of Ha Giang and the mountains
review.comment_negative: Breakfast is not great

review.comment_positive: View đẹp, vị trí trung tâm
review.comment_negative: Tất cả đều OK

review.comment_positive: Phòng ở sạch, giá cả phải chăng cho nhóm bạn đi phượt.
Good location, the staff were very helpful and friendly. The rooms were clean and comfortable beds.
review.comment_negative: Laundry price was on the higher side and clothes were not cleaned well. Still needed cleaning afterwards.

review.comment_positive: Phòng tương đối sạch. Nhân viên lịch sự, khá thân thiện.
Phòng rất rộng và đẹp, vị trí cũng ngay trung tâm, view cũng đẹp. Không có gì để chê
Khách sạn đáp ứng các nhu cầu cơ bản. Nhân viên lịch sự, hỗ trợ khi được yêu cầu.
Fantastyczny hotel w centrum miasta, bardzo dobre śniadanie.
review.comment_negative: Problem z językiem angielskim

review.comment_positive: sạch sẽ

review.comment_negative: If you are in doubt about booking a hotel in Ha Giang, ABSOLUTELY do not book this hotel. This is by far the worst hotel I've ever been to (and I've been to many!). We had two separate nights as a base for the start and end of the Ha Giang Loop, but barely got any sleep. Both rooms had a horrible smoke smell that you can smell all over the hotel. This ensures that you cannot sleep.  In addition, loud Vietnamese music starts every morning at 05:15, played across the street from the hotel (a nice outside dance class), which will wake you up for sure! Yet another point;  we thought to do a quick little laundry (a small plastic bag) this turned out to be more expensive than the whole overnight stay (more than 40 USD!). Also they charged us for using the towels. Overall, I would recommend you really to don't book this hotel, there are much better options out there! In addition we pointed out al this point to the staff but they did not help us at all!

review.rating: luxurious hotel with breathtaking views and friendly staff.
review.comment_positive: Beautiful big room with a big comfortable bed. Exactly what we needed after 2 long days of travel. We were travelling on our honeymoon and the staff went above and beyond to ensure our stay was memorable. location is perfect, so close to great food spots and the pool was a beautiful spot to hang out with a cocktail to enjoy the amazing views.
review.comment_negative: the only thing I can fault is when we had our massage there was loud party music coming from the Pool bar but it didn’t really bother us as the massage was so good!

review.comment_positive: De royale kamer en enorme badkamer met nieuwe meubels en mooie stoffering. Ook prachtig: enorm groot raam voor een mooi uitzicht. Top!
review.comment_negative:
Tip: reisbureau in het hotel voor het boeken van excursies en tours. Of een samenwerking aangaan met een lokaal reisbureau. De receptie kon ons niet helpen toen we een gids vroegen.
Tip: personeel engelse cursus laten volgen voor communicatie met de gasten. Het was moeilijk communiceren met het personeel in het restaurant en in de spa.

review.comment_positive: the room was perfect, the breakfast had many choice but some stuff was not that fresh. I couldn’t use the pool and the hotel was not finished so no fitness.

review.rating: Hành trình khám phá Hà Giang, Đồng Văn, Mèo Vạc nên dừng nghỉ tại YÊN BIÊN
review.comment_positive:
Địa điểm ngay trung tâm.
Phòng mới sạch, thái độ phục vụ rất tốt.
Cách cột mốc số 0 Hà Giang khoảng 100m
Bữa sáng phong phú, vừa miệng.
review.comment_negative:
Khách sạn nên lưu ý thêm khách về việc sử dụng dép nhựa khi sử dụng phòng tắm vì nền khá trơn.
Còn lại thì OK.

review.comment_positive: very good price-value ratio. Beds are confy.
review.comment_negative: breakfast is not a big deal, nothing special. outdoor pool and bar is closed. Ok, the pool maybe not closed but its dirty and lot of flies, insects in the water. They not clear it. maybe because its winter now, or due to COVID. But it could be a beautiful pool.

review.rating: Cool pool on a hot day
review.comment_positive: I read a recent review that the swimming pool and gym equipment were not available but they are now. Pool was lovely and clean.The beds were comfortable and hotel located close to food venues. Breakfast provided many delicious options
review.comment_negative: Some difficulty in communicating with staff. For example- They had a bar by the pool but staff did not understand a request for a drink. Realised they were just hanging around as there was no drinks at the bar.

review.comment_positive: I think it is worth the money. The room is great like a 4 stars hotel.
review.comment_negative: I didn’t like the fact that you cannot use the swimming pool neither the fitness. The hotel is still being developed. But it is fair for the price. The room are perfect and you have a nice breakfast.

review.comment_positive: The staff was amazingly helpful. It was my girlfriends birthday and they had placed roses, a card, and a birthday cake in the room for our arrival! Absolutely wonderful stay. The room was very luxurious and nice, lots of space. The rest of the hotel was very nice too! We had food in the restaurant, and it was very tasty!!
Vị trí đẹp, phòng rộng và sạch
Everything was excellent really, very comfortable room and staff very helpfull
review.comment_negative:
No hot shower the last night and morning.
Otherwise, everything was perfect!

review.comment_positive: Lage ist gut, Preis/Leistung angebracht.
review.comment_negative: Sprechen gar kein Englisch, Frühstück eher unterdurchschnittlich.

review.comment_positive: Nói chung là hài lòng. Phòng sạch sẽ, giống với mô tả.
ein sehr schönes Hotel. guter Ausgangspunkt für den Ha Giang Loop

review.rating: Great value for money, we will definitely stay again in Yen Bien hotel.
review.comment_positive:
The staff are caring and friendly. They arranged the bus ticket to Ninh Binh for us.
The laundry service was fast.
The room was very clean and comfy with an amazing view over the Ha Giang city.
The breakfast had a good variety.
review.comment_negative: The windows were not soundproof and the noise from outside could be heard.

review.comment_positive: Het bed was fijn, ruime kamer en lekkere douche.
review.comment_negative:
De kamer was ontzettend warm waar we wakker van werden. We moesten met het raam open slapen om het enigzins prettig te maken maar dat ging gepaard met geluid en de stank van uitlaatgassen. De airco stond in de 'wintermodus' dus die kon niet koelen. We kregen een ventilator wat lief bedoeld wat maar dat blies de warme lucht alleen rond. 
Bijna al het personeel spreekt geen Engels, dit maakt communiceren lastig, zeker als er een klacht opgelost moet worden.
Het hotel had voor ons een bus geregeld terug naar Hanoi waarbij wij begrepen dat deze ons dicht bij onze volgende accomodatie zou afzetten. Dat gebeurde helaas niet waardoor wij daarna nog een taxi moesten betalen. De bus en taxi waren hierdoor even duur als de accomodatie.
Al met al hadden wij dus geen goede ervaring, dat vonden we jammer want we wilden wat luxe na vier dagen slapen in de bergen.

review.comment_positive: Thuận tiện và rộng rãi.
review.comment_negative: Khu massage chưa hợp lý , nhất là khi trời lạnh.

review.rating: ok. but need to resolve restaurant.
review.comment_positive: location, clean and good value
review.comment_negative: food. the restaurant was closed and the foyer coffee shop has awful coffee and no food. it looks like it caters for weddings more than. a single guest

review.comment_positive: Phòng cách âm tương đối tốt, không gian yên tĩnh. Nói chung là một đêm nghỉ ngơi ổn.
gute Lage, sehr hilfsbereites Personal, Gepäck konnte kostenlos gelagert werden während der Giant Loop Tour
review.comment_negative: das Restaurant war nicht gut

review.rating: Chất lượng & dịch vụ rất tốt
review.comment_positive: Phòng sang trọng, đầy đủ tiện nghi.
review.comment_negative: không có

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện và chỗ nghỉ sạch sẻ.
review.comment_negative: Nên cải thiện về thực đơn ăn sáng cho phong phú hơn và nên đa dạng món ăn hơn.

review.comment_positive: Las magníficas vistas, la tranquilidad y las modernas instalaciones.
review.comment_negative: Echamos de menos una mayor fluidez de inglés en las personas de recepción.

review.comment_positive: Gia đình tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ khá ổn. Phòng rộng, có ban công.
Es war alles da was man für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt benötigt.

Hôtel tout confort, chambre spacieuse et bien aménagée. Belle vue sur la ville. Le petit déjeuner est très varié, vraiment pour tous les goûts. Personnel attentionné et sympa.
Nous avons également profité du spa : une expérience inédite !
review.comment_negative: Rien. Nous avons tenté le Phénix Hôtel et nous recommandons à 100% le Yen Bien : bien plus frais et moderne

review.rating: great hotel for the area you are in would stay there again if you are looking for a bit more comfort
review.comment_positive: if staying in ha giang this hotel is well adequate for a pleasant stay close to everything the hotel was clean and rooms were large we were doing the ha giang loop on motorbike so hotel carpark underneath was good and secure for the bike i would definitely recommend this hotel for a clean and comfortable stay in ha giang. Hotel on the main road but the noise did not bother us we were on the 6th floor there are rooms elsewhere.
review.comment_negative: it said no smoking in the room but we did smell smoke in the room so whether someone was smoking in  another  room and this was coming through the aircon system not sure.

review.comment_positive: The location is good. the price is reasonable.
review.comment_negative: Food for breakfast is not many. The POS is broken, so I couldn't use the credit card

review.comment_positive: This is a fantastic hotel to stay. We stayed one night prior to our Ha Giang loop motorbike tour. The spacious rooms are well kept with fantastic views over the city and mountains. Staff were professional and very helpful. This place is also great value for money with a huge selection available for breakfast. The stirfry beef (room service ) was a huge serving and delicious. Ihighly recommend this hotel.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Nhìn chung mọi thứ đều ổn. Phòng có đủ tiện nghi cơ bản cho chuyến đi của tôi.
Rất tốt
Large comfy room.  Huge breakfast.  Great location. Staff were amazing

review.rating: Chúng tôi hài lòng về chỗ lưu trú, nếu bữa sáng được cải thiện hơn thì tuyệt
review.comment_positive: Các món ăn của bữa sáng không được phong phú, chưa xứng tầm với một khách sạn 4 sao.
Vị trí khá thuận tiện, phòng sạch. Mọi thứ đều ổn, không có gì để phàn nàn nhiều.

review.rating: Chambre splendide mais hall d'entrée de l'hôtel et restaurant un peu froid.
review.comment_positive:
La taille des chambre est incroyable! petit salon avec canapé, jacuzzi et douche dans la salle de bain, piscine intérieure, salle de sport.
La jeune fille qui s'occupait de nous au restaurant était charmante.
review.comment_negative:
Le personnel ne parle pas anglais.
Personne au restaurant.. plus un hôtel destiné aux mariages, grandes tables de réception.. cadre assez froid.
J'avais perdu la carte pour accéder à la chambre(carte en plastique) j'ai dû payer 10 euros!

review.comment_positive: Staff was amazing, location directly in the center with a lot of restaurants
review.comment_negative: Pool facilities were not great, there is no food or drinks to order at the pool, staff does not speak good english

review.rating: Unbelievable to pay so much for customer service like this
review.comment_positive: The room and bed
review.comment_negative:
The inadequate customer service:
-only one English speaking guy out of the10 I spoke ( or try to)
-unprofessional attitude  in restaurant ( waited 25 minutes) , after serving my dinner someone stood at one meter distance to wait till i was finished.
My second time in this hotel ( could nit cancel after first stay)

review.comment_positive: 酒店位于市中心，很方便。工作人员也很友好，不错的体验。👍

깔끔하고 좋았다.조명이 밝아 눈이 시원한 느낌. 
침대도 폭신하고 5성급 호텔에 못지않은 시설~.
불필요하게 과할 필요없이 적재적소에 깔끔하게 배치된 물품.
욕조신발과 실내 슬리퍼가 분리되어 좋았고 모든게 다 좋았다.
다시 찾고싶은 호텔~.
review.comment_negative: 전혀 없어요

review.rating: Nice hotel for a one or two night stay
review.comment_positive: The rooms are very comfortable and large,
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was poor (though this appears a common trait in Vietnam), Location was a little outside of the centre of the city.

review.comment_positive: So với giá tiền thì chất lượng ở mức chấp nhận được. Phòng có cửa sổ.
Clean, spacious room,  delicious soup was cooked by chef Say  according our request in the evening, normal Asian breakfast in the morning
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Emplacement 
Grande chambre
review.comment_negative: PDJ moyen

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn đáp ứng các nhu cầu cơ bản cho nhóm. Giá cả phải chăng.

The room and its equipments, I had everythiong I needed.
The view on the mountains is really great and the breakfast is varied.

review.rating: A nice hotel before Ha Giang loop
review.comment_positive: The location. It is very close to Ha Giang 0 landmark. There is a great cafe (Kapa cafe) next to it. The park is within walking distance.
the room was really clean and comfortable with gorgeous views of ha giang
put us in the most lovely room for my partners birthday and surprised her with a cake it was lovely

Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ, đẹp

View ra sông đẹp

review.rating: Big but quiet clean and relaxing hotel
review.comment_positive: After spending 5 days on the back of a motorbike YenBien is pure Luxury to return to reality. Big, clean, comfortable hotel with large rooms, great beds, good laundry service and great pool in a city where you probably won’t stay longer than 1 or 2 days.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: This place was lovely! Clean, modern, great location and incredibly priced! Absolutely recommend!

review.comment_positive:
Good equipements. Clean
Big bed and bedroom

This hotel is amazing and such good value. The rooms are large, views stunning and staff very helpful. We stayed 2 nights, before & after the Ha Giang loop motorbike tour. What a luxurious place to come back to! It's a great place to stay.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Phòng ốc khá ổn so với số tiền bỏ ra. Phù hợp cho chuyến đi không yêu cầu cao lắm.

review.comment_negative: Shower stall leaked badly onto bathroom floor.  Towels were a bit small and thin .. a hotel of this standard should do better.  Worst, there was no complimentary water. Instead, they charged .. and at least double the street rate -- in my experience, good hotels in Vietnam provide complimentary bottles of water.

review.rating: Yên Biên hotel là lựa chọn tốt để kết thúc chuyến thăm quan Hà Giang tuyệt vời.
review.comment_positive: Vị trí thuận lợi, gần công viên, trung tâm.

Great kind staff 
Central location
Lovely view from the spacious room
Very clean and tidy
Tasty breakfast
Swimming pool
review.comment_negative: Whilst we liked the lovely swimming pool we didn't like the noisy music accompanying our swim.

review.comment_positive: Mọi thứ đều ở mức ổn. Phòng sạch sẽ, đúng với hình ảnh đã xem.

La chambre spacieuse et propre, lit confortable possibilité de laisser ses valises la journée du check out et de profiter de la piscine l'après-midi en attendant son bus du soir. 
Personnel sympathique
review.comment_negative:
Petit déjeuner sucré pourrait être amélioré. 
Nous n'avons pas mangé au restaurant car peu de choix et tres cher

review.comment_positive: Convenient location in the city center with a lot of food/drinks options around. Delicious breakfast with lots of choices for both Vietnamese and expats. Easy parking for both motorbikes and cars. Spacious rooom, super comfortable beds, excellent and helpful staff.
review.comment_negative: TV didn't work for a while but the staff fixed it very quickly.

review.rating: Luxury and relaxing stay for a few days for a very reasonable price.
review.comment_positive:
View from the top floor is fantastic.
Only a short walk to the city.
Bed and the room itself was very comfortable.
review.comment_negative:
We stayed here twice and paid for both stays in advance. When checking out after the second stay they didn't have a record of us paying. After some time and showing them the bank transfer statement they finally found the records.
Staff was very helpful finding alternative transport to Hanoi after we heard our bus had broken down.
Breakfast is very Vietnamese with few European options.
Went to the pool, which looked very nice, in the early evening but decided against a swim as we couldn't get past the really loud pop music being played over the speakers.

review.rating: Mixed feelings in this expensive hotel
review.comment_positive: It is a beautiful hotel, spacious rooms and good beds
review.comment_negative: The hotel has an international name so I think foreign guest can presume that at least some people speak the English language. One out of 12 spoke English. In my perception not ok for a hotel like this.

review.rating: 我前天也用booking 訂芒清山羅飯店就馬上開立正式越南發票.
review.comment_positive: 早餐很不錯！
review.comment_negative:
為什麼住宿費用，無法開立越南的發票？
去年我也住宿過該飯店就可以，照成我的困擾！
此次用booking 訂房時已經有註明要開立越南的正式發票了？也將我公司的資料填寫上去啦⋯⋯

review.comment_positive: Ausgesprochen freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Restaurant eher mittelmäßig

The hotel was brand new, very comfortable, clean, and a great location in the city centre.
The staff was helpful and friendly.
review.comment_negative:
The phone on my room did not work, even after fixing by the engineer (which only lasted for one day).
The breakfast could have some more variety.
And some of the staff's English could be better.

review.comment_positive: Very nice and large hotel - nice breakfast
review.comment_negative: Everything was great

review.comment_positive:
It was a nice stay. 
A little expensive but it is worth it. 
Nice big rooms, quiet and clean.
review.comment_negative:
It’s a gigantic hotel with more rooms then you can imagine. 
That’s why it doesn’t seem so cozy, but it is ok. 
The breakfast was not really for Europeans, which is also not a big problem.

review.rating: Nhân viên nhiệt tình nhưng khu bếp cách xa phòng ăn nên đồ ăn nguội, ăn sáng hết đồ sớm nên 8.00 khách không được phục v
review.comment_positive: Vị trí đẹp
review.comment_negative: Bữa sáng thiéu đồ ăn

review.comment_positive: Gia đình tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ khá thoải mái. Phòng rộng vừa phải, bữa sáng ăn tạm được.
good hotel very comfortable. good location.
review.comment_negative: the price of the room was a bit expensive and the staff were not speaking English at all, it was hard to communicate with them, they didn’t give us any recommendations for what to do around even when we asked.

review.comment_positive: Prachtige kamer, super vriendelijk personeel die de kamer hebben versierd voor mijn vriend z’n verjaardag
review.comment_negative: Gangen ruiken naar rook

review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel, the room that I got had a very nice view. The room is very spacious, modern and clean.
review.comment_negative: Better selection menu at the restaurant for non-asian food.

review.comment_positive: Nhìn chung tôi hài lòng với kỳ nghỉ. Mọi thứ đều khá, đúng như mong đợi.
clean, good breakfast
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, đáp ứng các nhu cầu cơ bản. Giá cả cũng hợp lý.
vor und nach dem Ha Giang Loop dort übernachtet. perfekt

review.rating: Super comfy, huge rooms, super clean, decent location
review.comment_positive:
- Comfy beds!!!
- Huge rooms
- Clean bathrooms
- Big bathroom
- Slippers and robe
- Floor to ceiling windows
- Chairs in room
- Big breakfast included
review.comment_negative: - Can hear EVERYTHING in the hallway and even outside, even on the 9th floor

review.rating: Có dịp quay lại sẽ nghỉ ở đây
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm thuận tiện, trung tâm nhất TP Hà Giang
Great room and lobby. High standart.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast has a lot of range, but food quality can be better.

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn có vị trí khá tốt, phòng sạch sẽ. Nhân viên lễ tân khá nhiệt tình.
very good room.
review.comment_negative: there was no hot watet

review.comment_positive: 직원들은 친절하고, 시설도 좋고, 방도청결했습니다.

Great room size and spotlessly clean.
Nice bathroom - just don't forget to lower the blind over the window to the room if you want some privacy!!!
Fairly central so most places are within walking distance.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast finishes at 9 - not ideal when you've been on the Loop for four days and are shattered! Very little 'western' food 
. 
Mainly caters for Vietnamese group  tours so it gets very loud!

Merci à tout le personnel pour leur accueil !

review.rating: "Luxury", das war ein Flop in diesem Haus
review.comment_positive: Von außen sieht das Hotel wirklich sehr luxuriös aus, große Empfangshalle, große Rezeption. Beim Check In hatten wir jedoch schon mal Sprachprobleme. In einem solchen Haus sollte man davon ausgehen, das Englisch zu den gesprochenen Sprachen gehört. Dem war aber nicht wirklich so. Das Zimmer selbst war absolut sauber, groß mit großem Bad und gut ausgestattet. Das war es aber auch schon mit Positivem.
review.comment_negative:
Leider waren die Zimmertüren nicht sonderlich schalldicht, so dass der Lärm in den halligen Gängen des Hotels ungedämmt im Zimmer ankommt. Das war so laut, dass ich nach draußen ging und die Leute im Gang um Ruhe bat. Das Frühstück war wirklich nichts Besonderes. Unfreundliches Personal, welches auf eine Frage nach Orangensaft nicht mal reagierte, die Tische waren vom Frühstück der vorherigen Gäste verschmutzt, wurden aber auch nicht gereinigt, die Qualität des Frühstücks ist mangelhaft. Kein frisches Obst, genauer gesagt gar nichts Frisches....
"Luxury" kann man sowas sicher nicht nennen. Außen "Hui" innen "Pfui"

review.rating: Way over priced for the service you receive. This is a wedding venue first and a hotel second.
review.comment_positive: The room was clean and the bed was comfortable
review.comment_negative: The phone didn’t work for room service, so we went to eat at the restaurant- which was closed. We had to ask someone to open for us and come serve us - the food was awful and the waiter stood and watched us eat as we were the only two in there. The lights in the gym were off and the bar at the pool was closed. The whole hotel felt like a ghost town. I think they mainly serve as a wedding venue. I would definitely not recommend!

Die Zimmer sind sehr gross und sauber. Ich habe noch eine Nacht verlängert, da es mir gefallen hat. Sehr gutes Preis- Leistungsverhältnis.

review.rating: Pleasantly luxurious and comfortable stay with large rooms and a great view
review.comment_positive: I really enjoyed staying at the hotel. It felt truly luxurious but in a very pleasant way. Especially after traveling for a few weeks through vietnam, this place allowed me to relax and sort myself before the ha giang trip. The pool and the very spacious room with a great view are just one of the many benefits. The staff was very forthcoming. Something that stood out, is that we were allowed to leave our luggage in a separate and secure room while doing the ha giang tour - for free. I would definitely come back for my next visit.

review.comment_positive: Good Value for money
review.comment_negative: Luxury hotel did not sell wine and gave us hot beer with a glass of ice

review.comment_positive: I had a fantastic 8 day stay at Yen Bien Luxury Hotel. After two weeks motorbiking rural Vietnam, it was the perfect place to relax and unwind. The rooms were very high spec, clean and spacious, with Netflix and You Tube on the TV which many hotels don't have. I was fortunate enough to stay on the 12th floor and the views over Ha Giang with the mountains beyond were absolutely incredible. There was a roof top swimming pool which I only went in a few times but one night the full moon was glowing on the horizon and it was truly stunning. The gym equipment was a little lacking and it was difficult to have a real work out there, so I joined a local gym which was 15 minutes away. However this was my only complaint. The entrance and the foyer was extremely grand, and the cold air conditioning hits you as soon as you enter, a welcome relief from the sweltering humidity outside! I had several massages in the spa area of the hotel which were high quality. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the breakfast was decent. The best part of all was the value for money! This hotel was extremely good value for money. I will return here when I come back to Ha Giang!
review.comment_negative: There should be more equipment in the gym.

review.comment_positive: Totale plaatje, kamer , receptie, spa, restaurant, staff echt in de watten gelegd
